headline: FDA Decision Opens Bigger Market for Novartis’s Blockbuster Gene Therapy
summary: Zolgensma is only approved for infants with spinal muscular atrophy. Older people will be able to use a new version of the treatment, called Itvisma.

raw.headline: FDA Decision Opens Bigger Market for Novartis’s Blockbuster Gene Therapy
raw.summary: Zolgensma is only approved for infants with spinal muscular atrophy. Older people will be able to use a new version of the treatment, called Itvisma.

headline: Biogen Inks Research Deal With Dayra to Boost Immunology Pipeline
summary: BIIB's research deal with Dayra targets oral macrocyclic peptides to advance its immunology pipeline and expand next-generation therapies.

raw.headline: Biogen Inks Research Deal With Dayra to Boost Immunology Pipeline
raw.summary: BIIB's research deal with Dayra targets oral macrocyclic peptides to advance its immunology pipeline and expand next-generation therapies.

headline: Eisai Completes Rolling Submission to US FDA for LEQEMBI® IQLIK™ (lecanemab-irmb) Supplemental Biologics License Application as a Subcutaneous Starting Dose for the Treatment of Early Alzheimer’s Disease Under Fast Track Status
summary: LEQEMBI IQLIK, if approved for initiation dosing, would be the first and only anti-amyloid treatment to offer at-home injection from the start of therapy to help patients and care partners treat this progressive, relentless diseaseTOKYO and CAMBRIDGE, Mass., Nov. 25, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Eisai Co., Ltd.
